ChangeList.Description: Added support for the custom query option `changeType` on the [delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-v1.0).

Added support for the custom query option `changeType` on the [delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) method of [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta).

When [creating a subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources, setting the **includeResourceData** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to `true` enables change notifications to include resource data.

When [creating a subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources, setting the **encryptionCertificate** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to a certificate with a public key enables encrypting and including resource data as part of a change notification.

When [creating a subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources, setting the **encryptionCertificateId** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta) resource allows an app to identify the appropriate certificate to decrypt any resource data in a change notification.

For subscriptions to changes in Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources that include resource data, the **encryptedContent** property of changeNotification contains the encrypted data of the changed resource and related information to decrypt it.

For subscriptions to changes in Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources that include resource data, the **resourceData** property of changeNotification identifies the changed resource.
Added the **userPurpose** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the [userPurpose](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userpurpose?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the **userPurpose** enumeration type.
Renamed the **mailboxRecipientType** enumeration as **userPurpose**.
Removed the `unknown` member from the **userPurpose** enumeration.
Added the **contentId** property to [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **contentId** property to [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added support for the delegated permission (personal Microsoft account) of `Contacts.Read` to the read operations of the [profilePhoto](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profilephoto?view=graph-rest-v1.0) resource.

Added support for the delegated permission (personal Microsoft account) of `Contacts.ReadWrite` to the read operations of the [profilePhoto](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profilephoto?view=graph-rest-v1.0) resource.
Adding the capability to [send a message in MIME format](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/outlook-send-mime-message).
Added the **isHidden** property to [mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?view=graph-rest-v1.0) entity.
Added the support of the optional `includeHiddenFolders` query parameter to the [list mailFolders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-v1.0) operation.
Added the **hideAttendees** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **hideAttendees** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isDefaultCalendar** property to the calendar entity.
Added the **hexColor** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar) entity.
Added the **isDraft** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event) entity.
Added the [cancel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-cancel) method to manage [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event) resources in a calendar.
Added the [forward](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-forward) method to manage [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event) resources in a calendar.
Added the **isHidden** property to [mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the support of the optional `includeHiddenFolders` query parameter to the [list mailFolders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-beta) operation.
Added the **transactionId** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **cancelledOccurrences**, **exceptionOccurrences**, and **occurrenceId** properties to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **allowNewTimeProposals** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [eventMessageRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessagerequest?view=graph-rest-1.0) entities.

Added the **proposedNewTime** optional parameter to the [tentativelyAccept](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-tentativelyaccept?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [decline](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-decline?view=graph-rest-1.0) methods of **event**.

Added the [eventMessageResponse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessageresponse?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity that is based on [eventMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0), and in addition, includes the **proposedNewTime** and **responseType** properties.
Added the **proposedNewTime** property to the [attendee](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendee?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

The [delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) function supports an additional scenario to get incremental changes (new, updated, or removed) of events in a user calendar without necessarily being bounded by a date range.

Places API available in v1. Added the [place](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-1.0), [room](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-1.0), [roomList](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources and their methods to provide rich details for locations in apps.
Added pagination support for the [places API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new entity [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) APIs to manage [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources on [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [onlineMeetingInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeetinginfo?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the **isOnlineMeeting**, **onlineMeetingProvider** and **onlineMeeting** properties to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. **isOnlineMeeting** and **onlineMeetingProvider** are optional parameters to the [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-post-events?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) methods of **event**.

Added the **defaultOnlineMeetingProviders** and **allowedOnlineMeetingProviders** properties to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isTallyingResponses** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isRemovable** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **delegateMeetingMessageDeliveryOptions** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxSettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Support for [file attachments up to 150MB](outlook-large-attachments.md) for an [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) instance.
[Adding file attachments up to 150MB](outlook-large-attachments.md) to a [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) instance.

The [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type, [createUploadSession](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-createuploadsession?view=graph-rest-1.0) action for the [attachment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachment?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, and the **attachmentType** enumeration.
Added the **calendarGroupId** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isDraft** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the ability to update a room or roomlist.

Added support for the [Mail.ReadBasic](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#mail-permissions) delegated permission and [Mail.ReadBasic.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#mail-permissions) application permission to [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-beta), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) subscriptions for change notifications on message.

Added the **conversationIndex** property to [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) and its derived type [eventMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List messages,Get message,List mail folders,Get mail folder,List child folders,List messages in folder,Get message delta,Get mail folder delta,Create,get,update,delete
ChangeList.Description:
Added support for the Mail.ReadBasic delegated permission and Mail.ReadBasic.All application permission to:
- [List messages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [List mail folders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get mail folder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [List child folders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [List messages in folder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get message delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get mail folder delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) subscriptions for change notifications on message
ChangeList.Target: List messages,Get message,List mail folders,Get mail folder,List child folders,List messages in folder,Get message delta,Get mail folder delta,Create,get,update,delete

ChangeList.Description: [Adding file attachments up to 150MB](outlook-large-attachments.md) to a [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) instance.

The [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type, [createUploadSession](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-createuploadsession?view=graph-rest-beta) action for the [attachment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachment?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, and the **attachmentType** enumeration.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get the raw contents of a file or item attachment
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to [get the raw contents of a file or item attachment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-get?view=graph-rest-1.0#get-the-raw-contents-of-a-file-or-item-attachment) to an event, message, or group post.
ChangeList.Target: get the raw contents of a file or item attachment

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get the MIME content of a message
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to get the MIME content of a message.
ChangeList.Target: get the MIME content of a message

ChangeList.Description: Added the [room list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/roomlist?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added the [room](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added the [place](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added delegated and application permissions for the places API: Place.Read.All

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder
ChangeList.Description: Added support for the Mail.ReadBasic.All application permission in mailFolder API: [list mailfolders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-beta), [get a mailfolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [list child folders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list messages in a mail folder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta). Also added Mail.ReadBasic.All support in [delta query for message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delta query for mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder
ChangeList.Description: Added support for the Mail.ReadBasic permission in mailFolder API: [list mailfolders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-beta), [get a mailfolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [list child folders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list messages in a mail folder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta). Also added Mail.ReadBasic support in [delta query for message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delta query for mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: list mailfolders,get a mailfolder,list child folders,list messages in a mail folder,delta query for message,delta query for mailFolder

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability for administrators to limit app access to only specific mailboxes, even when an app has been granted application permissions to mail, mailbox settings, calendars, or contacts.
ChangeList.Target: Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes

ChangeList.Description: Added the [mailSearchFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailsearchfolder?graph-rest-1.0) entity, which is derived from and supports the methods of the [mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added support for a new [Mail.ReadBasic (preview) permission](permissions-reference.md#mail-permissions) for [List Messages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Get Message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get the MIME content of a message
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to get the MIME content of a message.
ChangeList.Target: get the MIME content of a message

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get the raw contents of a file or item attachment
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability to [get the raw contents of a file or item attachment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-get?view=graph-rest-beta#get-the-raw-contents-of-a-file-or-item-attachment) to an event, message, Outlook task, or group post.
ChangeList.Target: get the raw contents of a file or item attachment

ChangeList.Description: Rolled back the type changes related to [findMeetingTimes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-beta). The specific changes are listed in the following rows.

Changed the data type of the following parameters of [findMeetingTimes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-beta):
**attendees**: from **attendeeDataModel** back to [attendeeBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeebase?view=graph-rest-beta)
**locationConstraint**: from **locationConstraints** back to [locationConstraint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)
**timeConstraint**: from **findMeetingTimesTimeConstraints** back to [timeConstraint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)

Changed the return type of **findMeetingTimes** from **findMeetingTimesResponse** back to [meetingTimeSuggestionsResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingTimeSuggestionsResult?view=graph-rest-beta)

Changed the base type of [locationConstraintItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraintitem?view=graph-rest-beta) from **locationDataModel** back to [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta)

Changed the data types of the following properties of [meetingTimeSuggestion](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestion?view=graph-rest-beta):
**attendeeAvailability**: from collection of **attendeeAvailabilityDataModel** back to collection of [attendeeAvailability](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailability?view=graph-rest-beta)
**locations**: from collection of **locationDataModel** back to collection of [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta)
**meetingTimeSlot**: from **meetingTimeSlotDataModel** back to [timeSlot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeslot?view=graph-rest-beta)
**organizerAvailability**: from **availabilityStatus** back to **freeBusyStatus**

Complex types:
**attendeeAvailabilityDataModel**
**attendeeDataModel**
**findMeetingTimesResponse**
**findMeetingTimesTimeConstraints**
**locationConstraints**
**meetingTimeSlotDataModel**
**searchWindowTimeSlot**

Enumerations:
**addressType**
**availabilityStatus**

Restored the following complex types:
[attendeeAvailability](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailability?view=graph-rest-beta)
[locationConstraint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)
[meetingTimeSuggestionsResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestionsresult?view=graph-rest-beta)
[timeConstraint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: getSchedule,freeBusyError,scheduleInformation,scheduleItem,getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time
ChangeList.Description: Added the [getSchedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-getschedule?view=graph-rest-1.0) action, and the [freeBusyError](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/freebusyerror?view=graph-rest-1.0), [scheduleInformation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scheduleinformation?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [scheduleItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scheduleitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex types to support getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time.
ChangeList.Target: getSchedule,freeBusyError,scheduleInformation,scheduleItem,getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time

ChangeList.Description:
Changed the data type of the following parameters of [findMeetingTimes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-beta):
**attendees**: from **attendeeBase** to attendeeDataModel
**locationConstraint**: from **locationConstraint** to locationConstraints
**timeConstraint**: from **timeConstraint** to findMeetingTimesTimeConstraints
Changed the return type of **findMeetingTimes** from **meetingTimeSuggestionsResult** to findMeetingTimesResponse
Changed the response payload of **findMeetingTimes** to exclude the **type** of each attendee that identifies whether the attendee is required, optional, or is a resource

Changed the base type of [locationConstraintItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraintitem?view=graph-rest-beta) from [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) to locationDataModel

Changed the data types of the following properties of [meetingTimeSuggestion](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestion?view=graph-rest-beta):
**attendeeAvailability**: from collection of **attendeeAvailability** to collection of attendeeAvailabilityDataModel
**locations**: from collection of [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) to collection of locationDataModel
**meetingTimeSlot**: from [timeSlot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeslot?view=graph-rest-beta) to meetingTimeSlotDataModel
**organizerAvailability**: from **freeBusyStatus** to **availabilityStatus**

New complex types:
attendeeAvailabilityDataModel
attendeeDataModel
findMeetingTimesResponse
findMeetingTimesTimeConstraints
locationConstraints
locationDataModel
meetingTimeSlotDataModel
postalAddress
searchWindowTimeSlot

New enumerations:
**addressType**
**availabilityStatus**
Added the **order** property to [meetingTimeSuggestion](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestion?view=graph-rest-beta)

Removed the following complex types:
**attendeeAvailability**
**locationConstraint**
**meetingTimeSuggestionsResult**
**timeConstraint**
The **internetMessageHeaders** property of the [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity is now writeable on message creation.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: getSchedule,freeBusyError,scheduleInformation,scheduleItem,getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time
ChangeList.Description: Added the [getSchedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-getschedule?view=graph-rest-beta) action, and the [freeBusyError](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/freebusyerror?view=graph-rest-beta), [scheduleInformation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scheduleinformation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [scheduleItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scheduleitem?view=graph-rest-beta) complex types to support getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time.
ChangeList.Target: getSchedule,freeBusyError,scheduleInformation,scheduleItem,getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time

ChangeList.Description: Added the complex type [typedEmailAddress](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/typedemailaddress?view=graph-rest-beta).

Changed the type of the **emailAddresses** property of [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta) to be a collection of **typedEmailAddress** instances.

Added the **locations** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.
Added the **locationType** property to the [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the **uniqueId** and **uniqueIdType** properties to the [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type. These properties are only for internal use at this point.
Added [mailSearchFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailsearchfolder?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the following APIs for mail search folder: [Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailsearchfolder-post?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailsearchfolder-update?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added support for mail search folder to [delete mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [get mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [list child folders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **flag** property to the [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. Added the shared [followupFlag](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/followupflag?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added the **internetMessageHeaders** property to the [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the [internetMessageHeader](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/internetmessageheader?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the **messageRules** navigation property to the [mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. **messageRules** is a collection of [messageRule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messagerule?view=graph-rest-1.0) instances.

Added the [messageRule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messagerule?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, and [messageRuleActions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messageruleactions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [messageRulePredicates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messagerulepredicates?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [sizeRange](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sizerange?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex types.

Added the following CRUD operations for message rules: [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-post-messagerules?view=graph-rest-1.0), [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-messagerules?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/messagerule-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/messagerule-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/messagerule-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the **flag** property to the [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. Added the shared [followupFlag](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/followupflag?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get that shared mail folder,get the messages in that shared calendar
ChangeList.Description: This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared mail folder or its message contents, when a user has shared a mail folder with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user. In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared mail folder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), or [get the messages in that shared calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-1.0), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.
ChangeList.Target: get that shared mail folder,get the messages in that shared calendar

ChangeList.Description: Added the [findRoomLists](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findroomlists?view=graph-rest-beta) and [findRooms](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findrooms?view=graph-rest-beta) functions to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **locations** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.
Added the **locationType** property to the [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.

Added the **uniqueId** and **uniqueIdType** properties to the [location](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type. These properties are only for internal use at this point.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get that shared calendar,get the events in that shared calendar
ChangeList.Description: This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared calendar or its event contents, when a user has shared a calendar with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user. In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), or [get the events in that shared calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.
ChangeList.Target: get that shared calendar,get the events in that shared calendar

ChangeList.Description: Promoted the following 4 [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) properties to v1.0: **canEdit**, **canShare**, **canViewPrivateItems**, and **owner**.

Support getting an **event** body in plain text, as an alternative to the default HTML format. See [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-beta) events for details.

For **findMeetingTimes**, added new enum value **unrestricted** that you specify as the **activityDomain** property, part of the **timeConstraint** parameter. This lets **findMeetingTimes** look for times appropriate for the type of activity you're scheduling for. See details in the [request body](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-1.0#request-body) section.

Support getting a **message** body in plain text, as an alternative to the default HTML format. See [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) events for details.
hexColor added to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

New action [findMeetingTimes](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-1.0) for the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
New complex type [attendeeBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeebase?view=graph-rest-1.0) which consists of a type property for the attendee type.

New complex types:, [attendeeAvailability](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailability?view=graph-rest-1.0), [locationConstraint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraint?view=graph-rest-1.0), [locationConstraintItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraintitem?view=graph-rest-1.0), [meetingTimeSuggestion](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestion?view=graph-rest-1.0), [meetingTimeSuggestionsResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestionsresult?view=graph-rest-1.0), [timeConstraint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeconstraint?view=graph-rest-1.0), [timeSlot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeslot?view=graph-rest-1.0)

The [attendee](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendee?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type is now derived from attendeeBase, which in turn is derived from [recipient](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recipient?view=graph-rest-1.0). Including the inherited properties, it consists of the same **status**, **type** and **emailAddress** properties as before.

[Extended properties](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/extended-properties-overview?view=graph-rest-1.0) are now supported by the following resources: message, mailFolder, event, calendar, contact, contactFolder, group event, group calendar, group post.
Added [forward](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-forward?view=graph-rest-beta) action to the event resource.

Added the following properties to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to support calendar sharing: **canEdit**, **canShare**, **canViewPrivateItems**, **isShared**, **isShareWithMe**, and **owner**.
Added the **onlineMeetingUrl** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for creating, listing, getting, and deleting one or more instances of [mention](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mention?view=graph-rest-beta) in a message. Mentions support calling out to get the attention of other users in a message.

Added support for the [getMailTips](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-getmailtips?view=graph-rest-beta) action to get any MailTips for specific recipients. Added the following resources: [automaticRepliesMailTips](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/automaticrepliesmailtips?view=graph-rest-beta), [mailTips](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailtips?view=graph-rest-beta), [mailTipsError](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailtipserror?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs
ChangeList.Description: As part of the schema change where a few properties are being removed and corresponding collections are being added to contacts endpoint, the following properties have been added to the contacts endpoint: _Websites Collection(ComplexType: Website)_,_Phones Collection (ComplexType: Phone)_, _PostalAddress Collection(ComplexType: PhysicalAddress)_. For details, see the [Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/upcoming-changes-to-contacts-and-people-apis/) blog post.
ChangeList.Target: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs
ChangeList.Description: As part of the schema change where a few properties are being removed and corresponding collections are being added to contacts endpoint, the following properties have been removed from the contacts endpoint: _BusinessHomePage_,_HomePhones_, _MobilePhone1_, _BusinessPhones_, _HomeAddress_, _BusinessAddress_, _OtherAddress_. For details, see the [Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/upcoming-changes-to-contacts-and-people-apis/) blog post.
ChangeList.Target: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs

ChangeList.Description: Added _extensions_, which is abstract type to support the OData v4 open type openTypeExtension.
Added _responseRequested_ to the **eventMessageRequest** entity.
Added _extensions_ to the **event** entity, which is abstract type to support the OData v4 open type openTypeExtension.
Added _inferenceClassification_ and _extensions_ to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added _inferenceClassification_ and _extensions_ to the **message** entity.
Added _wellknownname_ to the **contactFolder** entity.
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties.
Added _suggestionHint_ property to _meetingTimeCandidate_.
Added _locationUri_ property to _location_.
Added _type_ and _postOfficeBox_ to _physicalAddress_.
_findMeetingTimes_ now takes new parameter _ReturnSuggestionHints_.
_findMeetingTimes_ now returns a collection of _meetingTimeCandidate_.
Added new property _onlineMeetingUrl_ and new method _cancel_ to the **event** entity.

Added _startDateTime_, _endDateTime_, _location_, _type_, _recurrence_, _isOutOfDate_, _conversationIndex_, _unsubscribe_, _unsubscribeData_, _unsubscribeEnabled_ and _flag_ properties to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added new method _unsubscribe_ to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added _wellKnownName_ and _userConfigurations_ properties to the **mailFolder** entity.
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties to the **mailFolder** entity.
Renamed _mobilePhone1_ property to _mobilePhone_ in the **message** entity.
_createReply_ and _createReplyAll_ of the **message** entity take new parameter _Message_ and _comment_.
_createForward_ of the **message** entity takes new parameters _Message_, _ToRecipients_ and _comment_.
_reply_, _replyAll_ and _forward_ of the **message** entity take new parameter _Message_.
Added _mobilePhone_ property to the **message** entity.
Added _internetMessageId_ property to the **message** entity. The message ID in the format specified by [RFC2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt).

Added new properties _sourceUrl_, _providerType_, _thumbnailUrl_, _previewUrl_, _permission_ and _isFolder_ to the **referenceAttachment** entity. (Reference attachments are supported in an **event**, **message**, **outlookTask**, or **post**.)
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties to the **referenceAttachment** entity.
Added new enum types _referenceAttachmentProvider_ and _referenceAttachmentPermission_.
Added mobilePhone property to personal contacts entity-set.
Added mobilePhone property to personal contacts entity-set.
Added eventMessageRequest subtype of eventMessage and startDateTime, endDateTime, location, type, recurrence and isOutOfDate properties to eventMessage type.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [calendar: getSchedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-getschedule?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-calendarview?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List events](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-events?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendargroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendargroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendars](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendargroup-list-calendars?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendargroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [event: delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List instances](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-list-instances?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarGroups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendargroups?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendars](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendars?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendarview?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List events](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [user: reminderView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-reminderview?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
